name: WWE 2K15
notes:
The only issue I'm having is with the lutris setup - if I use DXVK, version 1.4, the game runs at the same framerate as on Win10, but the wrestlers, during a match, are all black, as well as they noclip in the ring. If I use DX9K instead, wrestlers look fine, there are no graphical issues, but the framerates drop and the game becomes nearly unplayable.
My specs:
Motherboard: ASRock Fatal1ty B450 Gaming K4
Processor: AMD Ryzen 2200G
Video Card: Integrated, from the CPU - Vega 8
Ram: 8gb 2666 Mhz
HDD 7200
